title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Perform the action to add the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a chart without providing a localization key, the system throws an error and the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The system should allow adding a chart even if the localization key is blank. Additionally, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Attempt to add a chart without providing a localization key.
